exmls.content:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameSceneSkin" width="800" height="480" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Button id="leftBtn" x="46" y="207" width="91" height="75">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="home_thxbg_jpg"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="upBtn" width="75" y="102" height="75" x="163">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="home_thxbg_jpg"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay0" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="rightBtn" width="88" y="205" height="77" x="267">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="home_thxbg_jpg"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay1" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="downBtn" width="83" y="307" height="79" x="160">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="home_thxbg_jpg"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay2" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="shootBtn" width="201" y="160" height="159" x="454">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="home_thxbg_jpg"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay3" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="PreloadSceneSkin" width="800" height="480" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Label id="progressLabel" text="标签" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>
